message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its unique features and high-quality materials. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exceptional item, I am offering it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, I'm looking to spend no more than $80 at this time. Would you be willing to consider $80?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $90. This is my final offer before considering other potential buyers.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but I'm still only able to go up to $85.  Let me know if that works for you.
